title: What salt do you have on your hot chips?
body: What salt on hot chips? When I get hot chips with someone and I say you like chicken salt and they say no I feel like killing them and then myself.

replies.body: Cheese and gravy > chicken salt > normal salt.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EbEpqn8m,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-28T07:17:19.153+0000)
>
> Cheese and gravy > chicken salt > normal salt.

YEAA, GRAVY'S THE SHIT BROTHER

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EbEpqn8m,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-28T09:31:56.630+0000)

good

do this from now on
so much easier to understand who you're talking to

i used to really love chicken salt

but i prefer regular salt now
im still fine with chicken tho
I usually ask for chicken salt, but I dont like chicken so i say chicken salt without the chicken and they seem to understand
I mix both and dump it in chicken chips along with fries, and occasionally 'cold chips' if I feel like I'm in an odd mood. If I do have chicken salt. I usually don't. So I guess normals....?
no contest, chicken salt for the win!

> [{quoted}](name=Garens Harem,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EbEpqn8m,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-28T08:12:07.554+0000)

Chicken salt tends to contain msg which some people have a problem with.
Normal salt, I have an intolerance to some of the crap they use in chicken salt
